message.content:
After tracing the lineage relationships, it is determined that Stephanie and Isabella both have Alice as a common descendant. Specifically, Stephanie is an ancestor of Ruth, and through a chain of descendants, Ruth is an ancestor of Alice. Similarly, Isabella is an ancestor of Brian, and through a chain of descendants, Brian is an ancestor of Alice. Therefore, Stephanie and Isabella share a common descendant.

<ANSWER>1</ANSWER>
